h2_title: How to Understand the Early Game Skills Trees
content: The Foundation section of the skills is divided into Stamina, Martial Arts, and Survival. In these skill trees, you’ll be able to awaken abilities that will reduce your stamina consumption, increase your health, and upgrade your standard attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Skills_to_Unlock.md', within the main section titled 'Best Skills to Unlock', specifically from the subsection 'How to Understand the Early Game Skills Trees'.
The content is as follows:
The Foundation section of the skills is divided into Stamina, Martial Arts, and Survival. In these skill trees, you’ll be able to awaken abilities that will reduce your stamina consumption, increase your health, and upgrade your standard attacks.
